ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: i think it does work....i did spec evoc because then i could use less mana for offensive spells and save my mana for healing the group when needed.....so far,
ygData.messageBody:
i think it does work....i did spec evoc because then i could use less mana for
offensive spells and save my mana for healing the group when needed.....so far,
it seems to be working ok for me....last night i think i got it up to like 90,
but i guess it'll take a while to show for real....like when it's 150
higher....

Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) wrote:

> From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
> With the last few patches did they fix specialization for clerics? I heard
> before the patch when you try to specialize in a certain area that it would
> be worse then not doing so?
